name: unbowdlerized
content:

(of a book, play, film, etc.) not having had words or parts that are considered unsuitable or offensive removed: Just like the old, unbowdlerized versions of fairytales, it contains quite a bit of death, violence, and cruelty. This is the first time modern audiences will get to experience the work in its original, unbowdlerised form. Related word
